verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of the Preacher, <S%H6953><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Vanity <S%H1892><s%> of vanities, <S%H1892><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Preacher, <S%H6953><s%> vanity <S%H1892><s%> of vanities; <S%H1892><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> is vanity. <S%H1892><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> profit <S%H3504><s%> hath a man <S%H120><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his labor <S%H5999><s%> which he taketh <S%H7945><s%> <S%H5998><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun? <S%H8121><s%>
One generation <S%H1755><s%> passeth away, <S%H1980><s%> and another generation <S%H1755><s%> cometh: <S%H935><s%> but the earth <S%H776><s%> abideth <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

The sun <S%H8121><s%> also ariseth, <S%H2224><s%> and the sun <S%H8121><s%> goeth down, <S%H935><s%> and hasteth <S%H7602><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> arose. <S%H2224><s%>

The wind <S%H7307><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the south, <S%H1864><s%> and turneth about <S%H5437><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the north; <S%H6828><s%> it whirleth about <S%H1980><s%> continually, <S%H5437><s%> <S%H5437><s%> and the wind <S%H7307><s%> returneth again <S%H7725><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to his circuits. <S%H5439><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the rivers <S%H5158><s%> run <S%H1980><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the sea; <S%H3220><s%> yet the sea <S%H3220><s%> is not <S%H369><s%> full; <S%H4392><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> from whence the rivers <S%H7945><s%> <S%H5158><s%> come, <S%H1980><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> again. <S%H1980><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> are full of labor; <S%H3023><s%> man <S%H376><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> utter <S%H1696><s%> it: the eye <S%H5869><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with seeing, <S%H7200><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the ear <S%H241><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> with hearing. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8085><s%>

The thing <S%H4100><s%> that hath been, <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is that which shall be; <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> and that <S%H4100><s%> which is done <S%H7945><s%> <S%H6213><s%> is that <S%H1931><s%> which shall be done: <S%H7945><s%> <S%H6213><s%> and there is no <S%H369><s%> <S%H3605><s%> new <S%H2319><s%> thing under <S%H8478><s%> the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

Is there <S%H3426><s%> any thing <S%H1697><s%> whereof it may be said, <S%H7945><s%> <S%H559><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is new? <S%H2319><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> hath been <S%H1961><s%> already <S%H3528><s%> of old time, <S%H5769><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> us.

There is no <S%H369><s%> remembrance <S%H2146><s%> of former <S%H7223><s%> things; neither <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3808><s%> shall there be <S%H1961><s%> any remembrance <S%H2146><s%> of things that are to come <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> those that shall come <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> after. <S%H314><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> the Preacher <S%H6953><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to seek <S%H1875><s%> and search out <S%H8446><s%> by wisdom <S%H2451><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> things that <S%H834><s%> are done <S%H6213><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> heaven: <S%H8064><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> sore <S%H7451><s%> travail <S%H6045><s%> hath God <S%H430><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> to be exercised <S%H6031><s%> therewith.

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> that are done <S%H7945><s%> <S%H6213><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun; <S%H8121><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> is vanity <S%H1892><s%> and vexation <S%H7469><s%> of spirit. <S%H7307><s%>

That which is crooked <S%H5791><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be made straight: <S%H8626><s%> and that which is wanting <S%H2642><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be numbered. <S%H4487><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> communed <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> mine own heart, <S%H3820><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Lo, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am come to great estate, <S%H1431><s%> and have gotten more <S%H3254><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> than <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> they that <S%H834><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> yea, my heart <S%H3820><s%> had great <S%H7235><s%> experience <S%H7200><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and to know <S%H3045><s%> madness <S%H1947><s%> and folly: <S%H5531><s%> I perceived <S%H3045><s%> that this <S%H2088><s%> also <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1571><s%> is vexation <S%H7475><s%> of spirit. <S%H7307><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> in much <S%H7230><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is much <S%H7230><s%> grief: <S%H3708><s%> and he that increaseth <S%H3254><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> increaseth <S%H3254><s%> sorrow. <S%H4341><s%>
